mapper.insert: insert into course_homework_submit(course_homework_id, student_id, course_homework_submit_date, course_homework_res) values (#{courseHomeworkId}, #{studentId}, #{courseHomeworkSubmitDate}, #{courseHomeworkRes})

insert into course_homework(course_homework_name, course_id, course_homework_date, course_homework_res, course_homework_description) values (#{courseHomeworkName}, #{courseId}, #{courseHomeworkDate}, #{courseHomeworkRes}, #{courseHomeworkDescription})
mapper.select: select student.student_name studentName, course_homework_submit_id, course_homework_id, course_homework_submit.student_id, course_homework_submit_date from student, course_homework_submit where student.student_id = course_homework_submit.student_id and course_homework_id = #{courseHomeworkId}

select student.student_name from student, course_homework, course_homework_submit where course_homework.course_homework_id = course_homework_submit.course_homework_id and course_homework_submit.student_id = student.student_id and course_homework.course_homework_id = #{courseHomeworkId}
mapper.delete: delete from course_homework_score where course_homework_submit_id = ( select course_homework_submit_id from course_homework_submit left join course_homework on course_homework_submit.course_homework_id = course_homework.course_homework_id where course_homework.course_homework_id = #{courseHomeworkId} )
